document_data.name: Khalek
document_data.mainbody: '''Khalek''' was a prospector that lived in the [[Sword Coast North]] region of [[Faerûn]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: The burly [[dwarf]] joined the expedition into [[Mount Hotenow]] led by [[Vandra Hillborn|Vandra]] of [[Clan Hillborn]] in order to investigate continued activity within the volcanic mountain.
document_data.History:
{{Quote|I've been trapped up here for quite a while. Fortunately for me, I always pack double [[ration]]s.|Prospector Khalek.}}

In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Khalek and other dwarves working under the geologist [[Darney]] ventured into [[Shadowfire Cavern]] when their group was attacked and separated. Khalek returned into the cave to investigate the [[magma elemental]] they had found, but became trapped. Khalek was rescued by the [[Hero of Sleeping Dragon Bridge]] after the famed adventurer was enlisted to to aid Vandra Hillborn and her geological expedition.
